statements: SELECT * FROM BudgetPlan WHERE id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, budget_amount FROM BudgetPlan WHERE budget_amount > 1000;
SELECT created_by FROM BudgetPlan WHERE plan_name = 'Monthly Budget';
SELECT * FROM BudgetPlan ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT plan_name, budget_amount FROM BudgetPlan ORDER BY budget_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM BudgetPlan WHERE budget_amount > 5000 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT plan_name, budget_amount FROM BudgetPlan WHERE created_by='John Doe' AND budget_amount < 10000
SELECT MAX(budget_amount) AS max_budget FROM BudgetPlan
SELECT *, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM BudgetPlan WHERE created_by LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY budget_amount DESC
SELECT AVG(budget_amount) AS avg_budget, COUNT(*) AS total_plans FROM BudgetPlan
SELECT * FROM budget_plans;
SELECT plan_name, plan_owner FROM budget_plans WHERE plan_owner='Alice';
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM budget_plans ORDER BY plan_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM plan_updates WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT plan_name, plan_owner, shared_with FROM budget_plans WHERE shared_with IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM budget_plans WHERE plan_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, plan_owner FROM budget_plans WHERE plan_owner = 'John Doe';
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM budget_plans WHERE plan_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name FROM budget_plans ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT plan_name, plan_owner, shared_with FROM budget_plans WHERE shared_with LIKE '%Marketing%';
SELECT * FROM budget_plans;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM budget_plans WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT collaborator_name, email FROM collaborators ORDER BY collaborator_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM plan_updates WHERE update_date >= '2022-02-01' ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT plan_id, collaborator_id, update_date, update_description FROM plan_updates WHERE plan_id = 1 AND collaborator_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM budget_plans WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM budget_plans WHERE plan_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND end_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY start_date
SELECT collaborator_name, email FROM collaborators ORDER BY collaborator_name ASC

SELECT plan_name, collaborator_name FROM budget_plans JOIN plan_updates ON budget_plans.plan_id = plan_updates.plan_id JOIN collaborators ON plan_updates.collaborator_id = collaborators.collaborator_id WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY plan_name, collaborator_name
SELECT count(*) AS total_updates, plan_id FROM plan_updates GROUP BY plan_id HAVING total_updates > 10 ORDER BY total_updates DESC, plan_id ASC
SELECT * FROM budget_plans;
SELECT plan_name, owner_id, created_at FROM budget_plans;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT expense_id, amount, category FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM budget_plans ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, plan_name FROM budget_plans WHERE owner_id = 3;
SELECT owner_id, COUNT(*) FROM budget_plans GROUP BY owner_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT u.username, b.plan_name FROM users u JOIN budget_plans b ON u.user_id = b.owner_id;
SELECT b.plan_name, e.amount, e.category FROM budget_plans b LEFT JOIN expenses e ON b.id = e.expense_id ORDER BY e.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM budget_plans;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM budget_plans;
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT expense_id, amount, category FROM expenses WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'Food%';
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM budget_plans WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(category_id) AS total_count FROM categories GROUP BY category_name HAVING total_count > 5 ORDER BY total_count ASC;
SELECT username, email, role FROM users WHERE role IN ('Manager', 'Employee') AND email NOT LIKE '%example.com' ORDER BY username ASC, role DESC;

SELECT users.username, expenses.amount, categories.category_name FROM users JOIN expenses ON users.user_id = expenses.user_id JOIN categories ON expenses.category = categories.category_name ORDER BY expenses.amount DESC;
